p: The average relevance ratings of the images ( M = 5.909, SD = 1.033) were positively correlated with the average arousal ratings of the images ( M = 4.651, SD = 0.531), r(318) = 0.621, p < 0.001. The correlation was strong, showing that the images determined to be most relevant to climate change were also rated by participants as being highly arousing, or exciting to look at ( Figure 2A).
